title: Miu Miu advertisement font
content:
what's the name of this font? or a font close to it? please advise, thank you so much!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107072133im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeface_6382.JPG)
  
(clarification: the font that says miu miu, not the blurry stuff underneath it)
author: redfuzzycow

comments.content: looks like a customized/edited version of [ITC Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107072133/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bauhaus/), Bold.
